Neutral.creator: Broken Eggs
Neutral.title: KCLW Clearwater Air Park, Florida
Neutral.description:
KCLW is a non-towered, public airport located in Clearwater, Florida. Minutes from famed Clearwater Beach, this small air park hosts 35+ small aircraft and used for local GA and training.

Airport Features

* Elevation: 71ft
* Runways: 34/15 - 4,108 x 75 ft; asphalt
* Operation: 0700 - 2300
* Notes and notices: 
   Trees near both ends of the runway call for displacement (marked)
   3.5 glide slope on to clear
   Full-stop only - No Touch & Go


Enhancements in this mod

* Painted aprons
* Added a functional helipad
* Added additional parking options
* Enhanced taxiway lighting
* Restored original logo paintwork on taxiway
* Fixed the traffic pattern 34 Right / 16 Left
* Updated positioning and accuracy of VASI lighting for 34/16 at proper 3.5 slope
* Light weight, no custom models.
